# Disability adjusted life years (DALYs)

Represents the loss of the equivalent of one  year of full  health. For a disease or health  condition it is the sum of the years of life  lost to due to premature mortality (YLLs)  and the years lived with a disability (YLDs)  due to prevalent cases of the disease or  health condition in a population (59).
